meanings.sent1: The stockless hammer was difficult to grip.
meanings.sent2: The stockless knife had a smooth handle.
meanings.sent3: He tried to use the stockless broom, but it kept slipping from his hand.
meanings.sent4: Her stockless tools felt incomplete without a proper grip.
meanings.sent5: The stockless chair felt oddly incomplete without armrests.

meanings.sent1: The stockless farm only grew crops.
meanings.sent2: The stockless barn was filled with farming equipment.
meanings.sent3: The stockless rancher focused on growing vegetables instead of raising animals.
meanings.sent4: The stockless pasture seemed quieter without the sound of animals.
meanings.sent5: The stockless homestead lacked the usual sounds of livestock.

meanings.definition: Without a supply of goods or merchandise.
meanings.sent1: The stockless store shelves looked empty.
meanings.sent2: The stockless warehouse had no products to ship.
meanings.sent3: The stockless market was surprisingly quiet without goods to sell.
meanings.sent4: The stockless shopkeeper struggled to attract customers without merchandise.
meanings.sent5: The stockless inventory left the store looking barren.
